data.message:
A special message for you Marshall, here is my little sister "Ashley", unavailable at the moment, in the comat, fighting for her own life feels, a beautiful soul of Détroit
The words of his nurse, his guardian angel, for you dear angel too...

"One thing would or may I ask you to tell him she is amazing and beautiful and loyal she is. A beautiful soul that the both grew up in Detroit. She goes to college and take care of her mom. Wants to be friends. Bad day call her. Good day she will always be there for you.
But if he wants to be true to her as a friend she will always be there"
